content:
Is severity a property of the allergy or the reaction in CDA?  What about in FHIR?

Is this correct? Severity is a property of Allergy in CDA, and of reaction in FHIR?
Lisa Nelson: In C-CDA, Severity is a property of a Reaction. It is forbidden to be used as a property of the allergy itself.  Criticality is a property of the allergy. In FHIR, severity also is associated with the reaction.
